price: 35. Alingi kobimisa bino o mabele na bino na bonganga naye, boye bokosala nini?
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihi famādhā tamurūna
